products.name: ODLR Gardenia Threadwork Gown
products.brandedName: ODLR Gardenia Threadwork Gown
products.description: Work this season's vibrant gardenia motif into special occasion looks with this romantic tulle gown. Decorated with all-over gardenia threadwork embroidery and finished with a high neckline and open back, this garment will be a go-to favorite.

products.name: Monochrome Soft Matte Refillable Lipstick
products.brandedName: Prada Monochrome Soft Matte Refillable Lipstick
products.description: What it is: A refillable, soft, weightless lipstick that delivers buildable coverage and a diffused matte finish. What it does: The lipstick is formulated with Micro-Fit technology, featuring a lightweight texture that glides seamlessly, fusing upon contact with the lips and feeling weightless. Infused with bifidus extract and jojoba oil, with Prada Monochrome lip quality looks visibly upgraded. The 13 luminous, long lasting matte colors are formulated with a white base and only 3 pure color pigments to reproduce the luminosity of the Prada nylon fabric in soft, diffused colors designed to flatter a range of skin tones. When reloaded with a consciously designed Prada refill, this reusable case contributes to a more responsible use of resources. By reloading your case with a refill, you may use 76% less packaging compared to repurchasing a full lipstick.*How to use: For defined matte lips, use Prada Monochrome Soft Matte Lipstick. Use the triangle shaped bullet to define a sharp lip contour. Starting with the Cupid's bow, fill in the lips. It glides effortlessly and delivers soft matte color in one stroke. *Refill available on a selection of shades Made in France

Metallic Crease Care: First turn the garment inside out on a flat surface or ironing board. Set your iron to the COOLEST setting (Silk). Place a clean tea or hand towel on the garment to create a barrier and iron in swift movements. Repeat this until whole garment is pressed. Hang the garment. Do not fold.

About the designer: Swedish entrepreneurs Jens Grede and Erik Torstensson joined forces in 2012 with the intention of designing the ideal pair of jeans. FRAME Denim was born, and has defined California chic ever since. Inspired by the fashion industry's off duty aesthetic, the label was quickly embraced by It Girls and lauded as an accessible global luxury brand. Today, Frame has expanded from handcrafted denim to ready to wear staples in the finest natural materials. Based in Los Angeles, Frame aims to be the West Coast's premiere lifestyle brand, and a reflection of the rich cultural capital that is LA.

products.brandedName: The Upside Ballpark Lana Crop Top
products.description: Ballpark Lana Crop Top Ballpark Lana Crop Top Self: 74% recycled polyamide 26% elastane Contrast Fabric: 72% polyester 28% elastane Lining: 86% polyamide 14% elastane. Made in China. Machine wash. Removable padded cups. Pull-on styling. Item not sold as a set. UPSD-WS47. USW124013. Inspired by the yoga communities of NYC, Sydney, and Hawaii, THE UPSIDE combines style and function for those looking to turn heads while breaking a sweat. Created on Oahu's North Shore, founder Jodhi Meares set forth to build a brand focused on an appreciation for our planet and the pursuit of healthy living. THE UPSIDE caters to the fashion-forward and eco-conscious babe, putting bold and trendy prints on high-quality, organic, recycled, and sustainable fabrics. However, the brand doesn't focus only on designing stylish and supportive athleisure; it also contributes a portion of its profits to organizations that advocate for child protection, mental health, and inclusivity. THE UPSIDE believes that how we move through the world matters, and that it's possible to be authentically yourself while shopping ethically and helping communities in need.

products.name: Black Lynne Dress
products.brandedName: Figue Black Lynne Dress
products.description: Figue (pronounced "fig") is a globally inspired and produced collection born out of a passion for travel. The brand's creative director draws inspiration from time spent in Paris and on the Mediterranean in Italy and combines luxury with bohemian. Sweet, short and sophisticated, the Black Lynne Dress does it all. Designed with floral embroidery and complete with stand collar and elbow length sleeves, this mini is a wardrobe must-have. We love wearing this stylish number to the office or to family get-togethers with gold heels and jewelry for a chic, elegant look filled with understated color! Stand collar Hook & eye closure at neckline Elbow length sleeves Column silhouette Mini length Embroidery design all over Soft stretch fabric Material: 100% Cotton Care: Dry clean
